modules.name: No Kid Infected
modules.description: REMOVE CHILDREN VISUALS: Removes child-like visuals from all biters, virals, and banshees in the world

modules.name: WarZones
modules.description: WARZONES: Not meant to be lore friendly, this version of the mod is a call to arms for all Human Enemies during the day to come out and take back the city

modules.name: Custom Map Data
modules.description: CUSTOM MAP CHANGES: (!Work in Progress!) May cause quest bugs/frame loss, adds new custom locations to the Windmills and Bazaar Exterior.

modules.name: Volatiles Begone
modules.description: Remove the Volatiles crawling around the world at night and in the day

modules.name: Remove Weapon Mod Visuals
modules.description: CUSTOM MAP CHANGES: (!Work in Progress!) May cause quest bugs/frame loss, adds new custom locations to the Windmills and Bazaar Exterior.

modules.name: Deadly Humans
modules.description: Damage boosts for most of the humans found in the world

modules.name: Infestation
modules.description: The infected no longer suffer from daylight and are more common around the world
